TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AnnotationAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the actions that occur with author, anchor, and cargo resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction> defines the operations that occur to an annotation's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction Added = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The component was added to the annotation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction Modified = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The component was modified within the annotation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction Removed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The component was removed from the annotation.
